string.value: You can apparently get some help from #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor...

You ran into #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor. #b#p1002001##k took one look at you, then told you how you remind him of himself in his younger, traveling days, so he feels the need to help you. He says if you can gather #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k, he'll acknowledge that you are worthy and give you his support. Ha, this should be quite a breeze for a great adventurer like you.

#t4000016# #b#c4000016#/100#k
#t4000004# #b#c4000004#/50#k

You showed #b#p1002001##k at Lith Harbor what you were made of as an adventurer. #b#p1002001##k recognized the potential in you and gave you some money to use on your journeys. You're going to put this to good use and become an excellent adventurer.

Hey! You setting out on an adventure? You look a little weak for that. It reminds me of... Well, when I was young, I was like you, eager to travel the world and soak up every experience I could. I miss those days. Ain't nothing quite like going on an adventure.
It was difficult at first, though. I didn't have any experience and I wasn't well-prepared. Seeing you reminds me of the tough times I faced…
I'm telling you this because I like you. If you can prove your worth as an adventurer, I will provide you with my full support for your upcoming journey. Deal?
Alright, then gather #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k and to bring them back to me. If you can do that, I'll acknowledge your skills as an adventurer.
Really? I was willing to help… if you change your mind, let me know.
Hey, it's amazing you were able to finish my task so quickly! I knew I had an eye for talent. I have no doubt that you will become one of the very best adventurers out there.
That money I handed you just now... I know it's not much, but it should still help a beginner like you. Here's hoping I'll see you all grown up down the road, with improved abilities and fancy gear.
Hm, you didn't gather the stuff I requested. Maybe I overestimated your abilities… I want you to bring me #b100 #t4000016#s#k and #b50 #t4000004#s#k. I know you are capable of doing this.
